trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration section that contains elements for specifying the namespace and contract name for a COM+ integration contract.
trans-unit.target: 代表組態區段，其中包含指定 COM + 整合合約的命名空間和合約名稱的項目。

trans-unit.source: The COM+ integration service contracts are currently restricted to the “http://tempuri.org” namespace, and contract name is derived from the supporting COM interface.
trans-unit.target: COM + 整合服務合約目前限制在"http://tempuri.org"命名空間，而合約名稱衍生自支援的 COM 介面。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, specify alternatives by using the `comContracts` section in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以指定替代項目使用`comContracts`組態檔中的區段。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the following configuration to specify the namespace and contract name for a service contract [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] When the service is initialized, the specified namespaces and contract names are applied to the generated service descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用下列組態來指定服務合約的命名空間和合約名稱[!code-cs [XpsCreate #XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent) ]當初始化服務時，所指定的命名空間和合約名稱會套用至所產生的服務描述。

trans-unit.source: When this section is empty, the service initialization applies a default namespace and contract name taken from the supporting COM interface ID.
trans-unit.target: 這個區段是空的當服務初始化會套用取自支援的 COM 介面 ID 的預設命名空間和合約名稱

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComContractsSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComContractsSection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the COM+ integration service contracts specified in the section.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有 COM + 整合服務合約的區段中指定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComContractElementCollection"></xref> that contains all the COM+ integration service contracts specified in the section.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComContractElementCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含所有 COM + 整合服務合約的區段中指定。
